ai-patthana8.23:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.23:1.1_0: Not identifying, they don’t identify with attention, and diversity of principles, both give rise to diversity of things.
ai-patthana8.23:1.1_1: Nor does one have the intention and aim of imagine that gives rise to knowledge, and principle not to arise.
ai-patthana8.23:1.1_2: Nor do they arise because of Self and knowledge, and view, no cause or reason for men.
ai-patthana8.23:2.1_0: Nor do they arise because of perception and nuns ...
ai-patthana8.23:3.1_0: Nor does one have the three knowledges: for the sake of identification, for knowledge and vision of the truth, and for the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana8.23:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
